version_description:
*** What's New in 6.5.2 ***
* Notes can now be shared via Messages
* Bug fix: Fixed a crash when opening specific notes
* Bug fix: Made it as easy to rotate/scale handwriting as it was in previous versions
* Bug fix: When searching for notes,

*** What's New in 6.5.2 ***
* Notes can now be shared via Messages
* Bug fix: Fixed a crash when opening specific notes
* Bug fix: Made it as easy to rotate/scale handwriting as it was in previous versions
* Bug fix: When searching for notes,

*** What’s New in 6.5.3 ***
* Updates for the new iPad Pro 10.5" screen size
* If a device is offline for a while, Auto-backup now runs as soon as the device reconnects to the internet
* Bug fix: The 'Paste' button no longer fails to appear in ce

*** What’s New in 6.5.3 ***
* Updates for the new iPad Pro 10.5" screen size
* If a device is offline for a while, Auto-backup now runs as soon as the device reconnects to the internet
* Bug fix: The 'Paste' button no longer fails to appear in ce

*** What's New in 6.6 ***
(√) OneDrive support
--- Like Google Drive, Dropbox, and Box, OneDrive is now a location for importing files, exporting files, and Auto-backup
(√) Checklists
--- Keep track of tasks, your grocery lists, and more
--

*** What's New in 6.6 ***
(√) OneDrive support
--- Like Google Drive, Dropbox, and Box, OneDrive is now a location for importing files, exporting files, and Auto-backup
(√) Checklists
--- Keep track of tasks, your grocery lists, and more
--

*** Bug fixes in 6.6.1 ***
(√) Fixed a crash on startup that affected some users
(√) Fixed a crash when inserting gifs from Giphy
(√) Fixed a crash when exporting/importing from Google Drive
(√) Fixed a bug that could disable indentation for t

*** Bug fixes in 6.6.1 ***
(√) Fixed a crash on startup that affected some users
(√) Fixed a crash when inserting gifs from Giphy
(√) Fixed a crash when exporting/importing from Google Drive
(√) Fixed a bug that could disable indentation for t

*** Improvements & fixes in 6.6.2 ***
(√) OneDrive: Added support for business and education accounts
(√) Bug fix: Some notes could take a long time to load
(√) Bug fix: Incorrect text layout in older notes
(√) Bug fix: Changing list style

*** Improvements & fixes in 6.6.2 ***
(√) OneDrive: Added support for business and education accounts
(√) Bug fix: Some notes could take a long time to load
(√) Bug fix: Incorrect text layout in older notes
(√) Bug fix: Changing list style

*** Fixes in 6.6.3 ***
(√) Bug fix: Crash when locking the device and the keyboard was visible

(√) Bug fix: Some notes could take a l

*** Improvements & fixes in 6.6.2 ***
(√) OneDrive: Added support for business and education accounts
(√) Bug fix: Some notes could take a l

*** What's New in 7.0 ***
• iOS 11 Integration
• Drag and Drop (iOS 11 Only)
▸ Tap+hold+move to start a drag
▸ Import files from other apps by dragging a file onto Notability's icon or using split screen
▸ Drag handwriting, images

*** What's New in 7.0 ***
• iOS 11 Integration
• Drag and Drop (iOS 11 Only)
▸ Tap+hold+move to start a drag
▸ Import files from other apps by dragging a file onto Notability's icon or using split screen
▸ Drag handwriting, images

*** Bug fixes in 7.0.1 ***
• Fixed an issue with connecting to WebDAV servers
• Fixed an issue with activating hyperlinks in PDFs
• Fixed a crash when taking pictures on iOS 11
• Fixed a crash when backing up notes to Google Drive
• Fixed a

*** Bug fixes in 7.0.1 ***
• Fixed an issue with connecting to WebDAV servers
• Fixed an issue with activating hyperlinks in PDFs
• Fixed a crash when taking pictures on iOS 11
• Fixed a crash when backing up notes to Google Drive
• Fixed a

*** What's new in 7.0.2 ***
• Added support for Managed App Configuration through Mobile Device Management.
▸ Schools and enterprises can configure Notability to manage access to features like cloud services and Giphy.
▸ For more informatio

*** What's new in 7.0.2 ***
• Added support for Managed App Configuration through Mobile Device Management.
▸ Schools and enterprises can configure Notability to manage access to features like cloud services and Giphy.
▸ For more informatio

*** What's new in 7.1 ***
• Added compatibility for iPhone X
• Opening notes from the Files app
▸ Tap on a note in the Files app to preview and import it in Notability
• Adjusting the speed of Text to Speech
▸ Go to Notability's sett

*** What's new in 7.1 ***
• Added compatibility for iPhone X
• Opening notes from the Files app
▸ Tap on a note in the Files app to preview and import it in Notability
• Adjusting the speed of Text to Speech
▸ Go to Notability's sett

*** What's New in 7.2 ***
• We now have a page margin toggle and preview for exported PDFs
• Greatly improved search speed
• Improved audio recovery when Notability is terminated while recording
*** Bug Fixes in 7.2 ***
• Notes will no long

• We now have a page margin toggle and preview for exported PDFs
• Greatly improved search speed
• Improved audio recovery when Notability is terminated while recording

• Page margins settings are now saved for Auto-Backup

• Page margins settings are now saved for Auto-Backup

*** Bug fixes in 7.2.3 ***
This is the last release that supports iOS 9
• Recording no longer stops when a PDF is added to a current note
• Recording counter now properly displays when split screen size is changed
• Fixed an issue with export

*** Bug fixes in 7.2.3 ***
This is the last release that supports iOS 9
• Recording no longer stops when a PDF is added to a current note
• Recording counter now properly displays when split screen size is changed
• Fixed an issue with export

*** Bug fixes in 7.2.5 ***
This is the last release that supports iOS 9
• Fixed an issue when saving a note after switching quickly between notes
• Fixed a problem when exporting a note from the Notes app to Notability (iOS 11)
• Improved err

*** Bug fixes in 7.2.5 ***
This is the last release that supports iOS 9
• Fixed an issue when saving a note after switching quickly between notes
• Fixed a problem when exporting a note from the Notes app to Notability (iOS 11)
• Improved err

*** What's new in 7.3 ***
• Improved support for notes containing large PDFs:
- Notes load faster and are more responsive when editing
- Reduced memory usage and increased stability
- Improved search reliability with very large PDFs

*** What's new in 7.3 ***
• Improved support for notes containing large PDFs:
- Notes load faster and are more responsive when editing
- Reduced memory usage and increased stability
- Improved search reliability with very large PDFs

*** What's new in 7.3.1 ***
• Added support for the dark keyboard when using the dark theme
• Fixed a problem where PDF backgrounds could disappear after renaming a note
• Miscellaneous stability improvements
*** What's new in 7.3 ***
• Imp

*** What's new in 7.3.1 ***
• Added support for the dark keyboard when using the dark theme
• Fixed a problem where PDF backgrounds could disappear after renaming a note
• Miscellaneous stability improvements
*** What's new in 7.3 ***
• Imp

*** What's new in 7.3.2 ***
• Fixed a crash that could occur when rendering PDFs
• Fixed a problem where some notes with a lot of handwriting wouldn't load properly
*** What's new in 7.3.1 ***
• Added support for the dark keyboard when using t

*** What's new in 7.3.2 ***
• Fixed a crash that could occur when rendering PDFs
• Fixed a problem where some notes with a lot of handwriting wouldn't load properly
*** What's new in 7.3.1 ***
• Added support for the dark keyboard when using t

*** 8.0 的更新***

Notability 完成了重大更新！為你帶來各項強大新功能，包括：

手寫識別、手寫筆跡轉換為文字、並排檢視兩份不同的筆記 (多工處理筆記)、無需返回資料庫即可快速切換筆記，以及新的幫助中心。

手寫搜尋 (iPad 版)
• 現在可使用手寫筆跡搜尋資料庫及特定筆記內的內容。 
• 手寫筆跡亦可轉換為文字。 
• 首次啟動 Notability 時，資料庫將編入索引，之後你便可透過手寫筆跡搜尋內容！如果手寫檔案眾多，系

*** 8.2 版本中的新功能 ***
• 简体和繁体中文有了更多可用的字体
• 现已支持自定义字体并且有了更多的默认字体！Notability 中的字体会根据设备的区域设置和首选语言来初始化数据
• 最近使用过的字体将会出现在字体菜单的首位，让记笔记更快速
• 改进了文本转语音 (TTS) 功能：选中文本的语言将自动检测并会以正确的语音来朗读
• 加快了较长笔记内的搜索速度
• 在创建新的主题时，新的主题将位于当前所选中主题的下方

*** 8.2 版本新內容 ***
• 更多簡體及正體中文字型
• 支援自訂字型和更多預設字型！字型會根據裝置的地區及偏好語言出現在 Notability
• 近期使用過的字型會出現在第一個字型選單中，讓您更快可以記筆記
• 改善文字轉語音功能，偵測所選文字的語言並以正確的語音發聲
• 加快長篇筆記中的搜尋
• 新主題將建立於目前所選主題下

• 修正在新增或移除頁面後搜尋結果不會更新的錯誤
• 修正讓「維持

*** 版本 8.3 的新功能***
我們聆聽到你所想的功能! 我們新增了強大的功能:自定義顏色、顏色滴管以匹配筆記中的 任何顏色、使用 Apple 的 Face ID 和 Touch ID 提高筆記安全性，以及應用程式內的文件轉換。

自定義顏色和顏色滴管
•自定義顏色可供使用 - 彩虹才是極限! 擴展你的調色板，最多可保存 32 種自定義顏色。
•可以使用色輪或輸入 HEX 值來選擇顏色。
•顏色滴管可讓您輕鬆選擇於筆記中的任何顏色並保存成為你的自定義顏色。

*** Notability 9.0 最新內容**** Notability 更新隆重推出啦！這次我們新增了全新強大功能：圖形、部分消除與更好的圖像控制。

圖形 • 畫出圖形後，按住筆觸不放，圖形就會完美標註在文件上！
• 圖形可調整風格與位置，模擬手繪體驗。
• 可建立正圓、橢圓、三角形、正方形、矩形、六邊形與各種不規則形狀。

部分消除 • 可使用多種橡皮擦大小，精準消除任何墨水筆觸，圖形也能擦得乾淨！
• 部分消除支援自由消除與選定範圍消除。
• 分

*** Notability 9.0 最新內容**** Notability 更新隆重推出啦！這次我們新增了全新強大功能：圖形、部分消除與更好的圖像控制。

圖形 • 畫出圖形後，按住筆觸不放，圖形就會完美標註在文件上！
• 圖形可調整風格與位置，模擬手繪體驗。
• 可建立正圓、橢圓、三角形、正方形、矩形、六邊形與各種不規則形狀。

部分消除 • 可使用多種橡皮擦大小，精準消除任何墨水筆觸，圖形也能擦得乾淨！
• 部分消除支援自由消除與選定範圍消除。
• 分

Notability 9.1 現已推出！我們新增了iOS 13 和 iPadOS 13的支援、文檔掃描、以及Notability更好的文件入方法。

新功能
• 支援iOS 13 和 iPadOS 13，包括：
◦ 系統還原 / 重做手勢
◦ 黑夜模式支援
◦ 在圖像中可搜尋文字
• 新增對文件掃描的支援 （只限iOS 13）
◦ 以相機掃描文件製作PDF檔
◦ 可搜尋掃描文件內的文字
•以更新導入流程

演示模式：
• 隱藏工具欄和選單，以全屏方式使用外部顯示器顯示筆記
• 筆記將裁剪為外部顯示器的寬高比，以便您清楚知道正在顯示的內容
• 鐳射指示筆
• 在演示期間使用多個筆記功能查看觀眾不會看到的另一篇筆記

單頁模式：
• 以水平模式逐頁查看筆記
• 可與演示模式配合使用，使頁面看起來像幻燈片

其他修復：
• 較大的上/下頁面箭頭
• 現在可以在使用 Apple Pencil 時用手指點擊以啟用縮放框

*** What's New in Notability 10.0 ***
This is one of our biggest updates! It provides options for customization, artistic tools, and introduces the all-new Notability Shop, which offers an exciting array of in-app purchases.

Features and improv

*** Notability 10.0.1 最新功能 ***
• 零星錯誤修正和改進

*** Notability 10.0 最新功能 ***
這次是我們最盛大的更新之一！提供各種客製化美術工具，並推出全新 Notability 商店，提供一系列令人興奮的應用程式內購買商品。

功能與改善：
• 用來快速切換墨水樣式的「收藏工具列」
• 可填入更多顏色、寬度和筆刷的「樣式彈出框」選單設計。
• 繪出可精準定位的各式箭頭和曲線。
• 點狀與虛線畫

*** Notability 10.0.1 最新功能 ***
• 零星錯誤修正和改進

‧現在您能在 iPhone 上使用貼紙

‧從筆記切換頁面直接新增筆記
‧修復多個錯誤並加以改善

*** Notability 10.2 更新內容***
Notability 商店現在可購買：

*** Notability 10.2 更新內容***
Notability 商店現在可購買：
• 數學式轉換 (Math Conversion)：將手寫公式和方程式轉換為教科書中的精美格式。

*** Notability 10.2.1 最新功能 ***
• 使用 Dash Planner 全新規劃表展開嶄新一年：版面簡潔、功能實用、直向模式設計的規劃表組合包內含 20 份強大範本和 288 種貼紙，可協助您簡化 2021 年的工作行程。
• 修正一項因數學算式轉換造成的少見崩潰，以及另一項與 PDF 連結相關的崩潰。
